lead_paragraph: ZICHLINSKY--Elliott, passed peacefully in his daughter's home in Portland, Oregon on July 6. His wife, Lisette pre-deceased him. Elliott is survived by his son, Murray, daughter, Marlene, daughter-in-law, Cathy, and two grandchildren, Alder and Juliah. Funeral Services will be held at Plaza Jewish Community Chapel, New York, Sunday, July 10, at 9:30am. 1/3
